tool_description: Creates colorwork charts and patterns for knitting, crochet, or weaving projects with multiple colors and motif arrangements.

motif_style.description: Design style (geometric, floral, fair isle, intarsia, abstract, traditional)

repeat_pattern.description: Whether pattern should be designed for tiling

error_messages: Unsupported craft type: Use one of [knitting, crochet, weaving].
Color count mismatch: color_count must match the number of items in color_palette (2-8).
Invalid motif style: Use one of [geometric, floral, fair isle, intarsia, abstract, traditional].
Chart dimensions out of range: chart_width and chart_height must be 10-100 stitches/rows.
Invalid complexity level: Use one of [simple, moderate, complex].
Dominant color not in palette: If specified, dominant_color must be one of the colors in color_palette.
usage: Specify craft_type, color_count, color_palette array, motif_style, and chart dimensions. Optional parameters fine-tune the design characteristics and layout.

yarn_usage_estimate.description: Estimated yarn usage for each color

technique_notes.description: Special techniques required for the colorwork
